HQ_Plaque1.synopsis: This is the narrator AD played on a plaque in HQ center in Shar temple - a slightly secluded area that the player needs to spot and jump into. It is a big hall with control maps, and books, dedicated to HQ gatherings, linking to other Sharran temples and societies

TrialsPlaque1.synopsis: This is a narrator AD on a long vertical plaque that contains a longer scripture. It is placed before the section of the temple that is dedicated to trials areas, so it can be a motivational guideline to what expects ahead.

OathPlaque2.synopsis: A plaque detailing the first part of the Oath of Eternal Shadow.

OathPlaque.synopsis: A plaque detailing the first part of the Oath of Eternal Shadow.

NightsongPrison_Plaque1.synopsis: This is a plaque with narrator AD near the soul cage - before the final trial of killing the Selunite to finish Dark Justiciar training. There are total 3 of them so information needs to be divided nicely.

EntranceSharPlaque.synopsis: The plaque below a painting of Shar covering burn victims with a dark shroud, shielding them from searing light.

TrialsPlaque1_0.speaker: Narrator
TrialsPlaque1_0.text: *Brave the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Test body, mind, and spirit with Her trials. Glory awaits the few who succeed.*

OathPlaque2_0.speaker: Narrator
OathPlaque2_0.text: *Offer your pain to Shar's embrace. Hear the Nightsong.*
OathPlaque2_0.context: NodeContext: The text of a plaque in a temple dedicated to Shar.

OathPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
OathPlaque_0.text:
*Cross from light into darkness;
give your life to the shadows.*
OathPlaque_0.context: NodeContext: Reading a signpost. Elturel pronounced 'ELL-tur-ELL'. Baldur pronounced 'Ball-dur'

EntranceSharPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
EntranceSharPlaque_0.text: *Shar. Singer of Eternal Night. Protector of the lost and forgotten.*
EntranceSharPlaque_0.context: NodeContext: Reading a plaque inside the temple of shadow.
